name: E-memory
description: Warrior Samu_N - survivor of clinical death and lost memory of himself and his fighting abilities. Around the year 5023. The engineers decide to use it in testing a new invention, Project Electro-Memory. He is placed in a special machine and his memory is recreated in a computer. When you start the game - you will start the simulation of the project. At this place, the warrior must collect the memory pieces and return the virus-infected memory.
